name: Seaquest Remake
description:
Sequest is a open source remake of original 1983 Activision Sequest witch is made with Thunder2D game engine.

Seaquest is a submarine game in which the player controls a water vessel and must avoid, collect or various objects at different levels of depth. The player must pick up divers under water.

Official Site: http://www.rubikgames.com/en/products/view/seaquest
